ygData.subject: Re: Yield Policy
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry Mik, Mystik I should have THOUGHT ABOUT IT, didn t mean to piss anyone off. Most everyone agrees something has to be done, This is Verant attempt to do
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry Mik, Mystik I should have THOUGHT ABOUT IT, didn't mean to piss anyone
off.

Most everyone agrees something has to be done, This is Verant attempt to do
something. I personally like the random loot on the random spawn Idea, but
the loot/poses an item once, and the min/max level cap on a magic item are
also possible ideas.

The reason I feel "First Come First Served" isn't fair is an experience I
had in Crush. I went to get the Crush Tunic. When I got to the tower 2 solo
mages were camping. I asked to join but they said they would rather solo,
but one offered to sell me the Tunic. Soon after Emperor Crush spawned.
Though I tried to kill him, but the mages just blew him away. I then
realized I had no chance to get the item so I paid the PP. Under the first
come first served rule I would have had to wait hours till both left,
formed a group capable of Killing Crush, then split the loot with my group.
In the mean Time hope the mage does not come back and KS

----- Original Message -----
From: Mystik <mystik@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 7:03 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Yield Policy


> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> i didn't say that was right now did i? there are jerks everywhere you go,
